amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-389 to make an exception from the bill's required showings for class certification for claims for monetary relief against the perpetrator of a terrorist attack by victims of such attack.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to provide an exception to the bill's required showing for class certification for any claims brought by the victims of a terrorist attack against the attack's perpetrators.
